item.title: Ease the capacity problem of B2B service industry Today!
item.description:
Ease the capacity problem of B2B service industry Today!

Grab capacity deals of audited solution providers

item.title: Developer Marketing Guide
item.description:
Developer Marketing Guide

Danielle Morrill joined Twilio in 2009 as Director of Marketing as the community grew from a few hundred developers to more than 100,000 members. She is currently the co-founder & CEO of Mattermark. During her Heavybit Speaker Series presentation, Morrill touts the advantages of simple yet effective marketing tools.

item.title: 95 Ways to find your first customers for customer development or your first sale
item.description:
95 Ways to find your first customers for customer development or your first sale

You can have the best idea in the world, but until you find someone besides yourself that wants it, it's not really a business. To find those people, as Paul Graham wrote in a recent essay, you have to "Do Things That Don't Scale." The problem is, it is often unclear what those "Things" are....

item.title: How to get Good Business Ideas - The Mental Alchemy of Ideation - Evergreen Business Fortnightly
item.description:
How to get Good Business Ideas - The Mental Alchemy of Ideation - Evergreen Business Fortnightly

The idea isn't everything, but it's an extremely important start. It seems like there is credit given to good ideas, but not enough emphasis on the process behind the idea. We're given the narrative of the Eureka moment, with no insight into the tributaries of ideas that really created the concept.

item.title: How Do You Do B2B Lead Management in Salesforce + HubSpot?
item.description:
How Do You Do B2B Lead Management in Salesforce + HubSpot?

I'm hoping to get an assist from this community. I'm looking for anyone that has great experience with B2B lead management in Salesforce + HubSpot. If you're someone that knows this topic well, I would love your first-hand knowledge on the questions below: How do you automate and assign leads when they have become "Marketing Qualified"?

item.title: The Tools Early-Stage Startups Actually Need to Understand Their Customers
item.description:
The Tools Early-Stage Startups Actually Need to Understand Their Customers

After 18 months of struggling to get traction with two product ideas, Segment started its turnaround. What followed was a two-year stretch of growth from four to 60 people, thousands of new customers and $44 million over several rounds of financing. What was the trigger for such a significant inflection point?

item.title: Startup Stash - Curated resources for your startup
item.description:
Startup Stash - Curated resources for your startup

Startup Stash is a curated directory of resources and tools to help you build your startup. Get inspired and build awesome stuff.

item.title: Predictable University
item.description:
Predictable University

Before Predictable Revenue, Aaron worked at Salesforce.com, where he created a revolutionary Cold Calling 2.0 inside sales process and team that helped increase Salesforce.com's revenues by $100 million. The same process has since also helped companies like Responsys (sold to Oracle to $1.5 billion), and Acquia (named the #1 fastest growing company in North America) dramatically speed up new sales growth.

item.title: Writing Home Page Headlines For The Modern World (3 Formulas That Work)
item.description:
Writing Home Page Headlines For The Modern World (3 Formulas That Work)

Read any copywriting manual or article and you will learn that the headline is the most important thing in your sales copy. And it's true. The sad thing is that the advice that follows is often severely outdated and originates from the snail mail sales letter people from the 1950s and beyond.

item.title: Common Growth Hacking Myths (and How Growth Actually Works)
item.description:
Common Growth Hacking Myths (and How Growth Actually Works)

You're familiar with the term "growth hacking", right? You've likely read about how Facebook, Uber, Airbnb, Hotmail, Dropbox, etc. growth hacked their way to mega success. Those case studies resulted in a widespread shift in thinking. Many marketers became more concerned with 10x growth hacks they read about online than strategy and growth process.
